resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

components.name: TiAPI
components.description: This component is used for cross-platform API work. Specifications are most likely to use this component.

fields.description:
The customer is requesting the ability to capture content from a webcam, upstream it to a server and then downstream it to the app.  This feature will be used for videochating so the performance should be real time.
The request is for both iOS and Android
fields.summary: Ti API: Add ability to videochat

comments.body: This is not something we plan on supporting in the platform. Implementation of this is left up to the developer.
Closing ticket as the issue will not fix and with reference to the above comments.
